org.redkale.net

类 AsyncConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.redkale.net.AsyncConnection
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.nio.channels.AsynchronousByteChannel, java.nio.channels.AsynchronousChannel, java.nio.channels.Channel

    public abstract class AsyncConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.nio.channels.AsynchronousByteChannel, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    详情见: http://redkale.org

    作者:
    zhangjx

      • create

        public static AsyncConnection create(java.lang.String protocol,
                                     java.nio.channels.AsynchronousChannelGroup group,
                                     java.net.SocketAddress address)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • create

        public static AsyncConnection create(java.lang.String protocol,
                                     java.nio.channels.AsynchronousChannelGroup group,
                                     java.net.SocketAddress address,
                                     int readTimeoutSecond0,
                                     int writeTimeoutSecond0)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        创建客户端连接
        参数:
        protocol - 连接类型 只能是TCP或UDP
        address - 连接点子
        group - 连接AsynchronousChannelGroup
        readTimeoutSecond0 - 读取超时秒数
        writeTimeoutSecond0 - 写入超时秒数
        返回:
        连接
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - 异常
